Body:
template = """

%% some whatever.

    %% more some whatever
    % if foo:
    % endif
        """
node = Lexer(template).parse()
self._compare(node, TemplateNode({}, [Text('\n\n', (1, 1)), Text(
    '% some whatever.\n\n', (3, 2)), Text("""   %% more some whatever
""",
    (5, 2)), ControlLine('if', 'if foo:', False, (6, 1)), ControlLine('if',
    'endif', True, (7, 1)), Text('        ', (8, 1))]))
